app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/1999-4915/11/11/1064/s1, Figure S1: Inhibition of Ery-Est against ZIKV in BHK21 and Vero cells through CCK8 assay. Figure S2: Inhibition of Ery-Est against ZIKV in multiple rounds of infection; Inhibitory activity of Ery-Est against high dose infection of ZIKV. Figure S3: Inhibition of Ery-Est against ZIKV (V-ZIKV) prepared in Vero cells.
